figures.caption: Parking space dimensions for garage and uncovered space in plan view

rules.title: Minimum number and type of parking spaces per dwelling

qualifiers.applicability: Each dwelling unit on a lot

variables.name: dwelling_unit_count
variables.description: Number of dwelling units on the lot (includes primary and second dwelling units)

constants.name: required_spaces_per_dwelling
constants.description: Total parking spaces required on the lot per dwelling

constants.name: min_covered_spaces_per_dwelling
constants.description: Minimum number of covered spaces required per dwelling

rules.title: Location restrictions for parking spaces within yards

qualifiers.scope: Placement of required parking spaces on residential lots
qualifiers.applicability: All required parking spaces (covered and uncovered)

variables.name: required_street_side_yard
variables.description: Zoning-defined required street side yard area

constants.name: street_side_yard_front_band_depth
constants.description: Depth of the front band of the required street side yard in which parking is prohibited

conditions.logic: No required parking space may be located within the required_front_yard
No required parking space may be located within the first 10 ft of the required_street_side_yard

ambiguities: The phrase 'or, first 10 ft of, required street side yard' is punctuated ambiguously; confirm measurement direction (from property line inward?) and whether the prohibition applies only to the first 10 ft or the entire required street side yard.
Measurement baseline for the 10 ft band is not specified (property line, back of sidewalk, or edge of curb).

rules.title: Underground parking garages prohibited unless variance granted

qualifiers.scope: Construction of underground parking garages on residential lots
qualifiers.applicability: All proposals for underground parking garages serving dwellings

conditions.logic: An underground parking garage may be permitted only if a variance is granted.

exceptions.description: Approval of a variance allows an underground parking garage.
dependencies: Variance approval process in applicable zoning code

ambiguities: The term 'underground' is not defined (fully or partially below grade).
The specific variance procedure and approval criteria are not provided in this excerpt.

rules.title: Separation required for covered parking structure to be considered detached

qualifiers.scope: Classification of covered parking structures (garage/carport) as detached
qualifiers.applicability: Covered parking structures on residential lots

variables.name: separation_distance
variables.description: Shortest horizontal distance between covered parking structure and the main dwelling

constants.name: min_detached_separation
constants.description: Minimum required separation from the main dwelling for the structure to be considered detached

conditions.logic: If separation_distance >= 3 ft, then the covered parking structure is classified as 'detached'; else it is not 'detached'.

ambiguities: Measurement method for separation (e.g., eave-to-wall, wall-to-wall, foundation-to-foundation) is not specified.
Treatment of architectural projections (eaves, gutters) in separation measurement is not specified.

rules.title: Minimum dimensions for uncovered parking spaces

qualifiers.scope: Dimensional standards for uncovered parking spaces

variables.name: uncovered_space_width
variables.description: Clear width of the uncovered parking space

variables.name: uncovered_space_length
variables.description: Clear length of the uncovered parking space

constants.name: min_uncovered_width
constants.description: Minimum clear width for uncovered parking space

constants.name: min_uncovered_length
constants.description: Minimum clear length for uncovered parking space

rules.title: Minimum inside clearance for covered parking spaces

qualifiers.scope: Dimensional standards for covered parking structures (garages and carports)
qualifiers.applicability: Each covered required parking space and multi-space configurations

variables.name: covered_space_clear_width
variables.description: Clear inside width per covered space

variables.name: covered_space_clear_length
variables.description: Clear inside length per covered space

variables.name: covered_structure_clear_width_total
variables.description: Total clear inside width of a two-car garage/carport

variables.name: covered_structure_clear_length_total
variables.description: Total clear inside length of a two-car garage/carport

constants.name: min_covered_clear_width_per_space
constants.description: Minimum clear inside width per covered space

constants.name: min_covered_clear_length_per_space
constants.description: Minimum clear inside length per covered space

constants.name: min_two_car_clear_width
constants.description: Minimum clear inside width for a two-car garage/carport

constants.name: min_two_car_clear_length
constants.description: Minimum clear inside length for a two-car garage/carport

conditions.logic: If number_of_covered_spaces_in_structure >= 2 then covered_structure_clear_width_total >= 20 ft AND covered_structure_clear_length_total >= 20 ft

ambiguities: Clarify whether structural elements (e.g., columns) are permitted within the clear area; 'clear inside' suggests no obstructions but specifics are not provided.

rules.title: Minimum vertical clearance for parking spaces

qualifiers.scope: Vertical clearance for required parking spaces
qualifiers.applicability: All required parking spaces (covered and uncovered)

variables.name: vertical_clearance
variables.description: Minimum unobstructed vertical clearance above the parking space footprint

constants.name: min_vertical_clearance
constants.description: Minimum vertical clearance for parking spaces

ambiguities: Measurement baseline for vertical clearance (e.g., finished floor to lowest obstruction) is not explicitly stated.
Treatment of overhead doors/opener equipment within the clear footprint is not specified.

rules.title: Clear area for parking spaces free of other uses

qualifiers.scope: Use of the required clear area of parking spaces
qualifiers.applicability: All required parking spaces (covered and uncovered)

conditions.logic: The required clear area of each parking space shall be free of other uses.

ambiguities: Examples provided (water heaters, washers/dryers, bicycle parking) are illustrative; confirm if any storage or structural intrusions are allowed within the clear area.

rules.title: Tandem arrangement allowance for second uncovered space

qualifiers.applicability: The second required space when it is uncovered

conditions.logic: The second required space may be configured in a tandem arrangement if it is uncovered.

ambiguities: Not specified whether tandem is allowed if both spaces are covered.
Not specified if tandem must be in-line with the covered space or may be tandem with another uncovered space.
Ingress/egress clearance and maximum tandem depth are not specified.

global_ambiguities: The narrative references 'residential neighborhoods'; confirm whether these standards apply citywide to all residential zones or only specific districts.
Definitions for 'required front yard' and 'required street side yard' are not included; rely on zoning definitions in referenced code sections.
